whymedx.title: we are affordable
whymedx.content: You may get your medication at a price that is lower than your copay at Medx Pharmacy,  We believe that medication should be accessible to anyone, and are always working on your side to help you get your medication at an affordable price

whymedx.title: Same-Day Delivery
whymedx.content: No more waiting in pharmacy lines. We will deliver your medication directly to your doorstep the same day you ordered it. If you place your order after 3pm, it will be delivered the next business day.  PLEASE BE AWARE:  Give us a call if you need it urgently, we are here to help

whymedx.title: Patient Consultations
whymedx.content: If you have any concerns regarding your medication, then you can meet with one of our pharmacists for a free consultation.

whymedx.title: $3 Prescriptions
whymedx.content: With our discount program, you can get some of the most common medications for $3 dollar. No insurance required. Find a list of our $3 generics HERE, sorted by Diagnosis

whymedx.title: Education Program
whymedx.content: We will organize educational seminars to help improve your knowledge about your medications

whymedx.title: Personalized Compounding
whymedx.content: Our pharmacists are trained in creating formulations that fit your exact needs and preferences.

service.title: free delivery
service.content: We pride ourselves in delivering premium services. That service extends to your door. If you can’t come to us, we’ll see that the products you need are delivered right to your home.

service.title: personal injury
service.content: If you were injured in a serious car accident, please call 713-526-1212 or visit 3033 Fannin St, Houston, TX 77004. Our personal injury partner Houston Medical Group will take care of you

review.name: Trung Nguyen
review.content: Thank You for saving our baby's life with your promptness and diligence. We are eternally grateful.

review.name: Arthur Huckaby
review.content: They were very helpful with locating a wheelchair for my Mother and worked with us to get the best deal with the insurance company. Even though we do not live near them any longer, we still drive across town because of the service we received. Much better than the other location that we had used for a long time.

review.name: Bonnie Kass
review.content: Excellent customer service and follow up. The staff is very professional and courteous. It was a pleasure working with them.
